root: ^Whoa! This is clearly the place to be.
^I'm not going anywhere! Come find me when the sun sets again.

About1: ^I like to move around all the time!
^But don't worry, I'll be here for a bit.
About2: ^I like to slide down the trunk of the tree and dodge as many branches as I can!
^Keep growing this tree, and we'll have the best slide ever!
About3: ^My ideas need to rattle around in my head until they're ready to come out.
About4: ^This is my third trip to the human world! Most spirits only go a handful of times.
About5: ^When I get crazy ideas, I have to find someone to talk to about them.
Encourage2: ^It is obvious to every spirit here that you're the best.
Encourage3: ^I've never doubted you for a second!
^And anyone that has was wrong. And I'm not just saying that because we're friends.
Encourage4: ^Nobody does it how you do it, and that's awesome. I like you for being you.
^And it should be weird for people to say that to each other!
Encourage5: ^Listen. You've done so much here. I hope you carry that with you.
^If things seem to tough, look back on this and remember how awesome you are.
Tip1: ^I would prune any and every branch I think is ugly! It's your tree, make it what you want!
Tip2: ^In my opinion, your trunk should be the only part of the tree that grows toward the sky!
Tip3: ^It's okay to make mistakes. I make mistakes all the time.
^Making a mistake while pruning can be scary because you can't take it back.
^But there's lots of stuff in life like that - you just have to trust yourself and do better next time.
Convo1: ^We're not supposed to talk too much about being a spirit.
^But in my mind seeing what you would ask us about is actually learning more about humans!
^So what would you want to know?
Convo2: ^I never do anything I don't want to do. Do you?
Convo3: ^I never want to miss out on anything, so I tend to say yes to everything.
Greeting3: ^I heard humans like to geet each other by discussing the sky.
Greeting5: ^Between you and me, I don't much care for formal titles.
^I mean, you're a great Tree Keeper, but...
^Nobody calls me "They who alights the sky." Which would be horrific. So I prefer it that way.
Greeting8: ^Well if it isn't my friend the Tree Keeper?
Greeting9: ^What's up in the sky this evening?
Greeting13: ^We are under attack by shadow demons!
^Hahaha, just kidding. Demons can't come into the human world.
Greeting15: ^Don't be fooled by my tough exterior, I'm actually twice as tough on the inside.
Greeting16: ^What's happening in the human world? Only good things? As if!
